overview: What do you get when you mix classical ballet with modern hip-hop dancing from Chicago's inner city? #hiplet follows the true drama of Homer Hans Bryant his young dance company Hiplet, as they learn to mesmerize audiences with a fusion of classical ballet and modern hip-hop dancing on their toes, while (sometimes, just barely) surviving the inner-city of Chicago and trying to make their way in the world as they grow in life and in their careers.
title: #Hiplet
